task.summary: resolved a problem where the PLAYER could run from combat through walls.
Arcanists now 'divine' the location of the player with an algorithm that deserves a star.
Monster will now attack the player if he is nearby.
Fixed a bug where text would leave the screen when displayed on the right. Moving the bubble with every text seems ugly.
Mostly working inventory. And a debug or two
Items are now listed chunks, so that the inventory can hold more than there are on the screen.
Magical attacks now penetrate non-magical defense.
Fixed a bug where FoV was miscalculated.
Monster in combat now spins towards player.
Using items in combat now takes a turn.
Using ONE item in combat now takes a turn and text is customized.
Random room now returns only cells that are part of rooms, and not corridors.
Minor fix plus give up on collision between monsters.
Controls appear well, next up is enemy info.
Removed redundant cell parameter from monster creation.

MESSAGE.value: Monster in combat now spins towards player.
Using items in combat now takes a turn.
Using ONE item in combat now takes a turn and text is customized.
Random room now returns only cells that are part of rooms, and not corridors.
Minor fix plus give up on collision between monsters.
Controls appear well, next up is enemy info.
Removed redundant cell parameter from monster creation.
